member.name: T:Epam.Xml.ReaderXml
member.summary: ReaderXml is class which describe work with xml file.

members.member:
Create dictionary which contains elements found by xPath.
contains path to xml file. contains string with xPath./// dictionary with elements method doesn't work wiht a big size files.
xmlRoute or xpath is null, empty, contains only white space or doesn't have an extension '.xml'
file not found
